vulnerabilities.description: Origin advertises HTTP/2 (h2) via ALPN; ensure HTTP/2-specific hardening (HPACK/DoS controls, reverse-proxy config).
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Review HTTP/2 configuration at the edge (WAF/CDN/proxy), apply rate limits, and keep TLS stack updated.

vulnerabilities.description: Server appears to honor URL override headers, which can lead to access-control bypass in some proxy/app configurations.
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Disable/strip URL override headers at the edge proxy, or ensure the application does not trust them.
